events.message: The customer reported a car collision that occurred on 2024-04-30 causing significant damage to the front bumper and headlights.
The claim was categorised under 'Auto Accident' after reviewing the initial report and relevant details provided by the claimant.
An agent was assigned to the case to handle all further communications, investigations, and updates regarding this vehicle accident.
The claim was officially acknowledged and the customer received confirmation that their case is now active in the system.
The claimant was requested to provide photos of the damaged vehicle, a police accident report, and repair estimates from certified mechanics.
All requested documents, including accident photos and official reports, were submitted by the claimant for verification and processing.
A thorough investigation into the accident circumstances and damage assessment was commenced to determine liability and claim validity.
The investigation concluded successfully, confirming the details of the collision and establishing liability in favor of the claimant.
A settlement amount covering repairs and additional costs was formally proposed to the claimant for approval and finalization.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the prompt handling of their accident claim and the fairness of the proposed settlement.
The claim was formally approved by the insurer after all conditions were verified and no further issues were identified.
The approved settlement payment was processed and issued to the claimantâ€™s bank account without delay.
After payment issuance and final confirmation from the customer, the claim was officially closed in the insurance system.
The claim case file was archived for record-keeping and future reference according to company policy and regulatory standards.
